page.title: 11EVENTS
page.content: The{Ythan Raft Race}first took place in 1978. The race involves old and young in the construction of their own rafts and sailing between{Ellon and {Logie Buchan,}a distance of 3 miles. The two hundred rafts and 1500 competitors this year raised Â£10,000 to be donated to the charities: Save the Children Fund, Action Research and local charities. The whole event attracts the equivalent of the population of Ellon! The following day {Ellon Gala,}organised by the Round Table, is held in the{Gordon Park.}The event has been taking place for at least 10 years, providing aid to local charities, such as Bone Marrow and Heart Defects Research. As well as raising Â£3000, it offers a full days entertainment for the family. From a survey,we know that the main attraction was{Northsound Radio.
